item.title: ABOUT ME
item.dc:creator: pixelwars
item.content:encoded:
[lead_p]Albert Einstein was a theoretical physicist who developed the general theory of relativity, effecting a revolution in physics.[/lead_p] For this achievement, Einstein is often regarded as the father of modern physics and the most influential physicist of the 20th century. While best known for his mass–energy equivalence formula E = mc2(which has been dubbed "the world's most famous equation"), he received the 1921 Nobel Prize in Physics "for his services to theoretical physics, and especially for his discovery of the law of the photoelectric effect". The latter was pivotal in establishing quantum theory within physics. [button color="navy" size="big" type="d3" icon="linkedin" target="" url="#"]RESUME[/button] [divider]

Let's socialize!

item.title: FORM ELEMENTS
item.dc:creator: pixelwars
item.content:encoded:
Here is all forms elements cross browser styled.
<form action="#" method="post"><label for="your-name">Your Name</label><input id="your-name" type="text" name="your-name">
<label for="your-email">Your Email</label><input id="your-email" type="text" name="your-email">
<label for="subject">Subject</label><input id="subject" type="text" name="subject">
<label for="budget">Budget</label><select id="budget" name="budget"><option value="1000$">1000$</option><option value="2000$">2000$</option><option value="3000$">3000$</option><option value="5000$+">5000$+</option></select>
<label for="attach-file">Attach a file</label><input id="attach-file" type="file" name="attach-file">
<label for="budgetm">Budget Multi</label><select id="budgetm" multiple="multiple" name="budgetm"><option value="1000$">1000$</option><option value="2000$">2000$</option><option value="3000$">3000$</option><option value="5000$+">5000$+</option></select>
<label for="your-message">Your Message</label><textarea id="your-message" name="your-message"></textarea>
<label>Tech</label>
<label class="inline-label"> <input type="checkbox" name="gender[]" value="male">HTML5</label><label class="inline-label"> <input type="checkbox" name="gender[]" value="female">jQuery</label><label class="inline-label"> <input type="checkbox" name="gender[]" value="female">Wordpress</label>
<label>Gender</label>
<label class="inline-label"> <input type="radio" name="radio" value="radio-1">male</label><label class="inline-label"> <input type="radio" name="radio" value="radio-2">female</label>
<input type="submit" value="Send it">
</form>

Pre, Code Blocks

This is an inline code block index.html is the main file.

Default

<meta charset="utf-8" />
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1">
<meta name="description" content="impressiVcard - impressiVCard Responsive HTML5 VCard Template">
<meta name="keywords" content="impressivcard, vcard, html5, ,portfolio">
<meta name="author" content="Pixelwars">

<title>ImpressivCard</title>

Google Syntax Prettify

[syntax_prettify]<meta charset="utf-8" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1"> <meta name="description" content="impressiVcard - impressiVCard Responsive HTML5 VCard Template"> <meta name="keywords" content="impressivcard, vcard, html5, ,portfolio"> <meta name="author" content="Pixelwars"> <title>ImpressivCard</title> [/syntax_prettify]

Google Syntax Prettify with Line Numbers

[syntax_prettify linenums="linenums"] /* TYPOGRAPHY */ h1 { font-size: 2.20em; margin: 0.8em 0 0.4em 0; } h2 { font-size: 1.60em; margin: 1.4em 0 0.8em 0; } h3 { font-size: 1.20em; margin: 1.0em 0; } h4 { font-size: 0.90em; margin: 1.0em 0; } h5 { font-size: 0.90em; margin: 1.0em 0 .8em 0; } h6 { font-size: 0.85em; margin: 1.0em 0 .8em 0; } [/syntax_prettify]

item.title: SHORTCODES
item.dc:creator: pixelwars
item.content:encoded:
Here is a showcase of default shortcodes available in this theme; [row][column width="5" offset=""]

Tabs

[tabs] [tab_head] [tab_title active="active" title="Tab One"][tab_title active="" title="Tab Two"] [/tab_head] [tab_content] [tab_pane]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text.[/tab_pane] [tab_pane]It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable.[/tab_pane] [/tab_content] [/tabs] [/column][column width="5" offset="2"]

Toggles

[toggles] [toggle active="" title="Web Design"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable.[/toggle] [toggle active="active" title="UI/UX Development"]This toggle content is shown on page load, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour.[/toggle] [/toggles]

Accordion

[accordions] [accordion active="" title="Web Design"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable.[/accordion] [accordion active="" title="UI/UX Development"]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable.[/accordion] [/accordions] [/column] [/row]

Lightbox

[row] [column width="3"] [inline_lightbox_wrap type="image" alt="Animal with love" thumbnail="http://themes.pixelwars.org/read-wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/09.jpg"] [inline_lightbox_image first_image="yes" gallery="01" title="Animal with love" url="http://themes.pixelwars.org/read-wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/lightbox-01.jpg"] [/inline_lightbox_wrap] [/column] [column width="3"] [inline_lightbox_wrap type="image" alt="Octopus is dangerous!" thumbnail="http://themes.pixelwars.org/read-wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/10.jpg"] [inline_lightbox_image first_image="yes" gallery="02" title="Octopus is dangerous!" url="http://themes.pixelwars.org/read-wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/lightbox-02.jpg"] [inline_lightbox_image gallery="02" url="http://themes.pixelwars.org/read-wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/lightbox-04.jpg"] [inline_lightbox_image gallery="02" title="Dog have dreams" url="http://themes.pixelwars.org/read-wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/lightbox-03.jpg"] [/inline_lightbox_wrap] [/column] [column width="3"] [inline_lightbox_wrap type="video" alt="Paper by FiftyThree" thumbnail="http://themes.pixelwars.org/read-wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/02.jpg"] [inline_lightbox_video gallery="03" title="Paper by FiftyThree" url="http://player.vimeo.com/video/37254322?badge=0&color=ffffff"] [/inline_lightbox_wrap] [/column] [column width="3"] [inline_lightbox_wrap type="audio" alt="Soundcloud embed" thumbnail="http://themes.pixelwars.org/read-wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/12.jpg"] [inline_lightbox_audio gallery="04" title="Soundcloud embed" url="http://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F207988&"] [/inline_lightbox_wrap] [/column] [/row]

Alerts

[row] [column width="6" offset=""] [alert type=""]NOTE: This is a standart alert message.[/alert] [alert type="info"]NOTE: This is an info alert message.[/alert] [/column] [column width="6" offset=""] [alert type="success"]NOTE: This is a success alert message.[/alert] [alert type="error"]NOTE: This is an error alert message.[/alert] [/column] [/row]

Call To Action

[call_to_action] [column width="8" offset=""]

Read is a WordPress theme focused on readibility!

What are you waiting for? Buy now and begin to blogging. [/column] [column width="4" offset=""] [cta_button_wrap] [button color="navy" size="big" type="d3" icon="buy" target="" url="#"]BUY NOW[/button] [/cta_button_wrap] [/column] [/call_to_action]

Project Actions

[project_action][button color="navy" size="big" type="d3" icon="download" target="" url="#"]DOWNLOAD[/button][button color="yellow" size="big" type="d3" icon="eye" target="" url="#"]PREVIEW[/button][button color="light" size="big" type="d3" icon="github" target="" url="#"]GITHUB[/button][/project_action]

Project Actions with 2 Buttons

[project_action][button color="green" size="big" type="d3" icon="download2" target="" url="#"]DOWNLOAD[/button][button color="grass" size="big" type="d3" icon="beaker" target="" url="#"]PREVIEW[/button][/project_action]
